message: Hi all (assuming some people remember me from the mailing list). ^_^  I just saw the address of this message board on the dram website, and since it actually looks active here I joined up. :)  I was just thinking about Dramatica stuff a few days ago, but I'll have to look back over what I was working on to figure out if I actually have a topic I want to discuss.
BTW if anyone has an unsolved topic here that they want me to reply to, point it out to me, because otherwise I'll assume topics older than the past few days are 'dead' and shouldn't be necroposted.
